requests.name: RegisterFundraisingPage
requests.description:
Registers a Fundraising Page on the JustGiving.com website, for example www.justgiving.com/John-Vaughan-Fowler.

When registering a page on JustGiving.com you *either* register a page for an event or an activity. If you try and register a page for an event and an activity you will get a validation error. This is a common source of errors. If you're supplying an eventId you must not supply an eventName, eventDate or activityType. If you want an event to be auto-generated for your fundraising page, you must not supply an event Id and supply eventName/eventDate/activityType instead.

{pageShortName} - Would be replaced with the short page url that uniquely identifies the page to the user. This is typically their name such as "John-Smith".

{pageShortName} - Would be replaced with the short page url that uniquely identifies the page to the user. This is typically their name such as "John-Smith".

requests.name: DeleteFundraisingPageAttribution
requests.description:
Deletes the attribution of a of a Fundraising Page. Typically used for a list of team members.

{pageShortName} - Would be replaced with the short page url that uniquely identifies the page to the user. This is typically their name such as "John-Smith".

requests.name: DeleteFundraisingPageImage
requests.description:
Deletes image from your fundraising page

{pageShortName} - Would be replaced with the short page url that uniquely identifies the page to the user. This is typically their name such as "John-Smith". {imageName} - Would be replaced with the image name. Please provide imageName with extension followed by underscore like {imageName}_{extension}. If it is Stock image then you have to add prefix "Stock" - stock_{imageName}_{extension}
